a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Changes in UK butterfly populations, Non-specialists
Changes in butterfly populations are measured as an index relative to populations in their start year (1976 or 1990
Source: UK Office for National Statistics; Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
Note: Year-to-year fluctuations in butterfly numbers are often linked to natural environmental variation, especially weather (unsmoothed index). We
therefore used a smoothed index to understand underlying patterns of change.
